QuestData.Title: Attack of the Iron Horde
QuestData.Description: We received reports of the Dark Portal turning red right before the attack. They call themselves the Iron Horde.$b$bTheir army is extremely well equipped, and their numbers appear to be unending.$b$bThey have already taken Okril'lon Hold and Nethergarde Keep. Our troops on the frontlines could use your help, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: Aka'Magosh, champion. I'm sure your presence on the field was inspiring for the troops.
